thread.title: City Snapshot: SABMiller and AB InBev agree £44 per share deal
thread.title_full: City Snapshot: SABMiller and AB InBev agree £44 per share deal

title: City Snapshot: SABMiller and AB InBev agree £44 per share deal
text:
13 Oct 2015 | By Alec Mattinson 
SABMiller has announced this morning it has agreed a £44 per share cash deal with AB InBev worth around £70bn. Available to members only 
Learn more about our membership packages.
